situation.title: Staying in the park
situation.meta_description: Staying in the park is allowed.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Staying in the park is allowed. Staying in the fresh air is recommended, but it should not be exaggerated - you should stay in the park with one other person maximum. The clustering of more than two people is prohibited. People living in the same household are the exception.

Avoid other people and keep a two-meters distance. If you cannot avoid other people, wear a face mask. We recommend wearing a face mask throughout the whole stay in the park. It is forbidden to consume alcohol there. Wash your hands thoroughly when you return home.

And of course, it is forbidden to visit the park during the curfew (9 PM - 4.59 AM). If you are a lover of midnight walk, you are unfortunately out of luck.

questions_answers.question: Can I have a picnic in the park?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but it must comply with the current rules on the freedom of movement. (Only two people with the exception for people from one household and ban of alcohol consumption.)

questions_answers.question: Can I drink alcohol in the park with my friends?
questions_answers.value: No. It is prohibited to consume alcohol on publicly accessible places.

questions_answers.question: Can I go to the park with my children to fly a kite?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but it is necessary to maintain social distance from others and eventually wear a face mask.
